query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Poi che la carità del natio loco 2 mi strinse, raunai le fronde sparte 3 e rende’le a colui, ch’era già fioco.
query.result:
**English:**
1 Then, when the love of my native place 2 constrained me, I gathered the scattered leaves 3 and returned them to him who was already faint.
**Malay:**
1 Kemudian, ketika cinta tanah airku 2 mendesakku, kuambil daun-daun yang berserakan 3 dan mengembalikannya kepada dia yang sudah lemah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 Indi venimmo al fine ove si parte 5 lo secondo giron dal terzo, e dove 6 si vede di giustizia orribil arte.
query.result:
**English:**
4 Then we came to the end where one departs 5 from the second round to the third, and where 6 one sees the horrible art of justice.
**Malay:**
4 Kemudian kami sampai di ujung tempat orang berangkat 5 dari lingkaran kedua ke ketiga, dan tempat 6 terlihat seni keadilan yang mengerikan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 A ben manifestar le cose nove, 8 dico che arrivammo ad una landa 9 che dal suo letto ogne pianta rimove.
query.result:
**English:**
7 To manifest the new things well, 8 I say that we arrived at a plain 9 that removed every plant from its bed.
**Malay:**
7 Untuk memanifestasikan hal-hal baru dengan baik, 8 kukatakan bahwa kami tiba di sebuah dataran 9 yang menyingkirkan setiap tanaman dari tempat tidurnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 La dolorosa selva l’è ghirlanda 11 intorno, come ’l fosso tristo ad essa; 12 quivi fermammo i passi a randa a randa.
query.result:
**English:**
10 The sorrowful forest is a garland 11 around it, like the sad moat to it; 12 there we stopped our steps, side by side.
**Malay:**
10 Hutan yang menyedihkan itu adalah karangan bunga 11 di sekelilingnya, seperti parit yang menyedihkan baginya; 12 di sana kami menghentikan langkah kami, berdampingan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Lo spazzo era una rena arida e spessa, 14 non d’altra foggia fatta che colei 15 che fu da’ piè di Caton già soppressa.
query.result:
**English:**
13 The ground was a dry and thick sand, 14 made in no other way than that 15 which was once trodden down by Cato's feet.
**Malay:**
13 Tanah itu adalah pasir yang kering dan tebal, 14 tidak dibuat dengan cara lain selain itu 15 yang pernah diinjak oleh kaki Cato.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 O vendetta di Dio, quanto tu dei 17 esser temuta da ciascun che legge 18 ciò che fu manifesto a li occhi mei!
19 D’anime nude vidi molte gregge 20 che piangean tutte assai miseramente, 21 e parea posta lor diversa legge.
query.result:
**English:**
16 O vengeance of God, how much you should be 17 feared by everyone who reads 18 what was revealed to my eyes!
19 I saw many herds of naked souls 20 who were all weeping very miserably, 21 and it seemed that different laws were imposed on them.
**Malay:**
16 Wahai pembalasan Tuhan, betapa engkau seharusnya 17 ditakuti oleh setiap orang yang membaca 18 apa yang telah nyata di mataku!
19 Aku melihat banyak kawanan jiwa-jiwa telanjang 20 yang semuanya menangis dengan sangat menyedihkan, 21 dan tampaknya hukum yang berbeda telah dijatuhkan kepada mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Supin giacea in terra alcuna gente, 23 alcuna si sedea tutta raccolta, 24 e altra andava continüamente.
query.result:
**English:**
22 Some people were lying supine on the ground, 23 some were sitting all huddled up, 24 and others were walking about incessantly.
**Malay:**
22 Ada orang-orang yang terbaring di tanah, 23 ada yang duduk meringkuk, 24 dan ada pula yang berjalan mondar-mandir tanpa henti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Quella che giva ’ntorno era più molta, 26 e quella men che giacëa al tormento, 27 ma più al duolo avea la lingua sciolta.
query.result:
**English:**
25 The one that went around was more numerous, 26 and the one that lay in torment was less, 27 but the latter had its tongue more loosened to grief.
**Malay:**
25 Yang berjalan di sekeliling lebih banyak, 26 dan yang terbaring dalam siksaan lebih sedikit, 27 tetapi yang terakhir lidahnya lebih bebas untuk berduka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Sovra tutto ’l sabbion, d’un cader lento, 29 piovean di foco dilatate falde, 30 come di neve in alpe sanza vento.
query.result:
**English:**
28 Over all the sand, with a slow fall, 29 fell broad flakes of fire, 30 like snow in the Alps without wind.
**Malay:**
28 Di atas semua pasir, dengan jatuhnya yang perlahan, 29 berjatuhan serpihan api yang melebar, 30 seperti salju di Alpen tanpa angin.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Quali Alessandro in quelle parti calde 32 d’Indïa vide sopra ’l süo stuolo 33 fiamme cadere infino a terra salde,
34 per ch’ei provide a scalpitar lo suolo 35 con le sue schiere, acciò che lo vapore 36 mei si stingueva mentre ch’era solo:
37 tale scendeva l’etternale ardore; 38 onde la rena s’accendea, com’ esca 39 sotto focile, a doppiar lo dolore.
query.result:
**English:**
31 Like Alexander in those hot regions 32 of India saw above his army 33 flames falling steadily to the ground,
34 so that he ordered his troops to trample the ground 35 with their hooves, so that the vapor 36 would be extinguished while it was still alone:
37 in such a way the eternal fire was descending; 38 so that the sand was ignited, like tinder 39 under a flint, to double the pain.
**Malay:**
31 Seperti Alexander di wilayah-wilayah panas itu 32 di India melihat di atas pasukannya 33 api jatuh dengan mantap ke tanah,
34 sehingga ia memerintahkan pasukannya untuk menginjak-injak tanah 35 dengan kuku mereka, agar uapnya 36 dapat dipadamkan saat masih sendiri:
37 dengan cara seperti itu api abadi itu turun; 38 sehingga pasir itu menyala, seperti sumbu 39 di bawah batu api, untuk menggandakan rasa sakit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Sanza riposo mai era la tresca 41 de le misere mani, or quindi or quinci 42 escotendo da sé l’arsura fresca.
query.result:
**English:**
40 Without rest ever was the throng 41 of the wretched hands, now here now there 42 shaking off from themselves the fresh burning.
**Malay:**
40 Tanpa henti adalah kerumunan 41 dari tangan-tangan yang malang, sekarang di sini sekarang di sana 42 menyingkirkan dari diri mereka sendiri rasa terbakar yang segar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 I’ cominciai: «Maestro, tu che vinci 44 tutte le cose, fuor che ’ demon duri 45 ch’a l’intrar de la porta incontra uscinci,
46 chi è quel grande che non par che curi 47 lo ’ncendio e giace dispettoso e torto, 48 sì che la pioggia non par che ’l marturi?».
query.result:
**English:**
43 I began: "Master, you who conquer 44 all things, except for those stubborn demons 45 who rush out to meet us at the entrance of the gate,
46 who is that great one who does not seem to care 47 about the fire and lies there spiteful and twisted, 48 so that the rain does not seem to bother him?"
**Malay:**
43 Aku mulai: "Guru, kamu yang menaklukkan 44 segala sesuatu, kecuali para iblis keras kepala 45 yang bergegas keluar untuk menemui kita di pintu masuk gerbang,
46 siapa gerangan orang hebat itu yang tampaknya tidak peduli 47 dengan api dan berbaring di sana dengan penuh kebencian dan bengkok, 48 sehingga hujan tampaknya tidak mengganggunya?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 E quel medesmo, che si fu accorto 50 ch’io domandava il mio duca di lui, 51 gridò: «Qual io fui vivo, tal son morto.
query.result:
**English:**
49 And that same one, who had noticed 50 that I was asking my guide about him, 51 cried out: "As I was alive, so I am dead.
**Malay:**
49 Dan orang yang sama itu, yang telah menyadari 50 bahwa aku bertanya kepada pemanduku tentangnya, 51 berteriak: "Seperti aku ketika hidup, begitulah aku ketika mati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Se Giove stanchi ’l suo fabbro da cui 53 crucciato prese la folgore aguta 54 onde l’ultimo dì percosso fui;
55 o s’elli stanchi li altri a muta a muta 56 in Mongibello a la focina negra, 57 chiamando “Buon Vulcano, aiuta, aiuta!”,
58 sì com’ el fece a la pugna di Flegra, 59 e me saetti con tutta sua forza: 60 non ne potrebbe aver vendetta allegra».
query.result:
**English:**
52 If Jove wearied his smith from whom, 53 angered, he took the sharp thunderbolt 54 with which I was struck on the last day;
55 or if they wearied the others in turn 56 at the black forge in Mongibello, 57 calling “Good Vulcan, help, help!”,
58 as he did at the battle of Phlegra, 59 and shot me with all his strength: 60 he could not have a joyful vengeance.
**Malay:**
52 Jika Jove melelahkan pandai besinya yang darinya, 53 dengan marah, ia mengambil petir tajam 54 yang dengannya aku dipukul pada hari terakhir;
55 atau jika mereka melelahkan yang lain secara bergantian 56 di bengkel hitam di Mongibello, 57 memanggil “Vulcan yang baik, tolong, tolong!”,
58 seperti yang dilakukannya pada pertempuran Phlegra, 59 dan menembakku dengan seluruh kekuatannya: 60 ia tidak akan bisa mendapatkan pembalasan yang menyenangkan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Allora il duca mio parlò di forza 62 tanto, ch’i’ non l’avea sì forte udito: 63 «O Capaneo, in ciò che non s’ammorza
64 la tua superbia, se’ tu più punito; 65 nullo martiro, fuor che la tua rabbia, 66 sarebbe al tuo furor dolor compito».
query.result:
**English:**
61 Then my leader spoke with such force 62 that I had never heard him so strong: 63 "O Capaneus, in that your pride is not quenched, 64 you are punished all the more; 65 no torment, except your own rage, 66 would be sufficient pain for your madness."
**Malay:**
61 Kemudian pemimpinku berbicara dengan kekuatan 62 sedemikian rupa, sehingga aku belum pernah mendengarnya sekuat itu: 63 "O Capaneus, dalam hal kesombonganmu tidak padam, 64 engkau lebih dihukum; 65 tidak ada siksaan, kecuali amarahmu sendiri, 66 yang akan menjadi rasa sakit yang cukup untuk kegilaanmu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Poi si rivolse a me con miglior labbia, 68 dicendo: «Quei fu l’un d’i sette regi 69 ch’assiser Tebe; ed ebbe e par ch’elli abbia
70 Dio in disdegno, e poco par che ’l pregi; 71 ma, com’ io dissi lui, li suoi dispetti 72 sono al suo petto assai debiti fregi.
query.result:
**English:**
67 Then he turned to me with a gentler voice, 68 saying: "That was one of the seven kings 69 who besieged Thebes; and he had and seems to still have
70 God in disdain, and he seems to care little for Him; 71 but, as I told him, his acts of spite 72 are to his breast quite suitable ornaments.
**Malay:**
67 Kemudian dia berpaling kepadaku dengan suara yang lebih lembut, 68 berkata: "Itu adalah salah satu dari tujuh raja 69 yang mengepung Thebes; dan dia memiliki dan tampaknya masih memiliki
70 Tuhan dalam penghinaan, dan dia tampaknya tidak peduli padanya; 71 tetapi, seperti yang kukatakan kepadanya, tindakan penghinaannya 72 adalah perhiasan yang cukup pantas untuk dadanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Or mi vien dietro, e guarda che non metti, 74 ancor, li piedi ne la rena arsiccia; 75 ma sempre al bosco tien li piedi stretti».
query.result:
**English:**
73 Now he comes behind me, and watch that you do not put, 74 again, your feet in the burning sand; 75 but keep your feet always close to the wood».
**Malay:**
73 Sekarang dia datang di belakangku, dan awas jangan sampai kamu meletakkan, 74 lagi, kakimu di pasir yang panas membakar; 75 tetapi jagalah kakimu selalu dekat dengan hutan».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Tacendo divenimmo là ’ve spiccia 77 fuor de la selva un picciol fiumicello, 78 lo cui rossore ancor mi raccapriccia.
query.result:
**English:**
76 Silently we came to where there ends 77 outside the forest a little stream, 78 whose redness still horrifies me.
**Malay:**
76 Dengan diam kami sampai di tempat di mana berakhir 77 di luar hutan sungai kecil, 78 yang kemerahannya masih membuatku ngeri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Quale del Bulicame esce ruscello 80 che parton poi tra lor le peccatrici, 81 tal per la rena giù sen giva quello.
query.result:
**English:**
79 Like a stream that flows out of Bulicame, 80 which the sinners then divide among themselves, 81 so did that one go down through the sand.
**Malay:**
79 Seperti sungai yang mengalir keluar dari Bulicame, 80 yang kemudian dibagi-bagikan di antara para pendosa, 81 begitulah sungai itu mengalir di atas pasir.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Lo fondo suo e ambo le pendici 83 fatt’ era ’n pietra, e ’ margini dallato; 84 per ch’io m’accorsi che ’l passo era lici.
query.result:
**English:**
82 Its bottom and both of its slopes 83 were made of stone, and the edges on the side; 84 because of which I realized that the passage was narrow.
**Malay:**
82 Dasarnya dan kedua lerengnya 83 terbuat dari batu, dan tepinya di samping; 84 karena itu aku menyadari bahwa jalannya sempit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 «Tra tutto l’altro ch’i’ t’ho dimostrato, 86 poscia che noi intrammo per la porta 87 lo cui sogliare a nessuno è negato,
88 cosa non fu da li tuoi occhi scorta 89 notabile com’ è ’l presente rio, 90 che sovra sé tutte fiammelle ammorta».
query.result:
**English:**
85 “Among all the other things that I have shown you, 86 after we entered through the gate 87 whose threshold is denied to no one,
88 what thing was not seen by your eyes 89 as remarkable as the present stream, 90 which quenches all flames above it?”
**Malay:**
85 “Di antara semua perkara lain yang telah kutunjukkan kepadamu, 86 setelah kita masuk melalui pintu gerbang 87 yang ambangnya tidak dilarang bagi siapa pun,
88 hal apakah yang tidak terlihat oleh matamu 89 yang luar biasa seperti sungai yang sekarang ini, 90 yang memadamkan semua api di atasnya?”

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Queste parole fuor del duca mio; 92 per ch’io ’l pregai che mi largisse ’l pasto 93 di cui largito m’avëa il disio.
query.result:
**English:**
91 These words came from my guide; 92 wherefore I begged him to grant me the food 93 for which he had aroused my desire.
**Malay:**
91 Kata-kata ini keluar dari pemanduku; 92 oleh karena itu aku memintanya untuk memberiku makanan 93 yang telah dibangkitkannya hasratku untuk memakannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 «In mezzo mar siede un paese guasto», 95 diss’ elli allora, «che s’appella Creta, 96 sotto ’l cui rege fu già ’l mondo casto.
query.result:
**English:**
94 "In the middle of the sea sits a ruined land," 95 he said then, "which is called Crete, 96 under whose king the world was once pure.
**Malay:**
94 "Di tengah laut terletak sebuah negeri yang hancur," 95 katanya kemudian, "yang disebut Kreta, 96 di bawah rajanya dunia pernah suci.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Una montagna v’è che già fu lieta 98 d’acqua e di fronde, che si chiamò Ida; 99 or è diserta come cosa vieta.
query.result:
**English:**
97 There is a mountain that once was joyful 98 with water and leaves, which was called Ida; 99 now it is deserted like something old and worn out.
**Malay:**
97 Ada sebuah gunung yang dulunya gembira 98 dengan air dan dedaunan, yang disebut Ida; 99 sekarang sunyi seperti sesuatu yang tua dan usang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Rëa la scelse già per cuna fida 101 del suo figliuolo, e per celarlo meglio, 102 quando piangea, vi facea far le grida.
query.result:
**English:**
100 Rhea had already chosen it as a safe cradle 101 for her son, and to better conceal him, 102 when he cried, she had the Curetes make loud noises.
**Malay:**
100 Rhea telah memilihnya sebagai buaian yang aman 101 untuk putranya, dan untuk lebih menyembunyikannya, 102 ketika dia menangis, dia menyuruh para Curetes membuat suara gaduh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Dentro dal monte sta dritto un gran veglio, 104 che tien volte le spalle inver’ Dammiata 105 e Roma guarda come süo speglio.
query.result:
**English:**
103 Inside the mountain stands a great old man, 104 who turns his back to Damietta ten times 105 and looks at Rome as his mirror.
**Malay:**
103 Di dalam gunung berdiri seorang lelaki tua yang agung, 104 yang membelakangi Damietta sepuluh kali 105 dan memandang Roma sebagai cerminnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Ciascuna parte, fuor che l’oro, è rotta 113 d’una fessura che lagrime goccia, 114 le quali, accolte, fóran quella grotta.
query.result:
**English:**
112 Every part, except for the gold, is broken 113 by a fissure that drips tears, 114 which, collected, would fill that cave.
**Malay:**
112 Setiap bahagian, kecuali emas, retak 113 oleh celah yang menitiskan air mata, 114 yang, terkumpul, akan memenuhi gua itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Lor corso in questa valle si diroccia; 116 fanno Acheronte, Stige e Flegetonta; 117 poi sen van giù per questa stretta doccia,
118 infin, là ove più non si dismonta, 119 fanno Cocito; e qual sia quello stagno 120 tu lo vedrai, però qui non si conta».
query.result:
**English:**
115 Their course in this valley is headlong; 116 they form Acheron, Styx, and Phlegethon; 117 then they go down through this narrow channel,
118 finally, where one can descend no further, 119 they form Cocytus; and what that marsh is like 120 you will see, but here it is not told.
**Malay:**
115 Arus mereka di lembah ini deras; 116 mereka membentuk Acheron, Styx, dan Phlegethon; 117 kemudian mereka mengalir turun melalui saluran sempit ini,
118 akhirnya, di tempat yang tidak bisa dituruni lagi, 119 mereka membentuk Cocytus; dan seperti apa rawa itu 120 kamu akan melihatnya, tetapi di sini tidak diceritakan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 E io a lui: «Se ’l presente rigagno 122 si diriva così dal nostro mondo, 123 perché ci appar pur a questo vivagno?».
query.result:
**English:**
121 And I to him: "If this present stream 122 flows down from our world, 123 why does it appear to us only at this edge?".
**Malay:**
121 Dan aku kepadanya: "Jika sungai ini 122 mengalir dari dunia kita, 123 mengapa ia hanya muncul di tepi ini?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Ed elli a me: «Tu sai che ’l loco è tondo; 125 e tutto che tu sie venuto molto, 126 pur a sinistra, giù calando al fondo,
127 non se’ ancor per tutto ’l cerchio vòlto; 128 per che, se cosa n’apparisce nova, 129 non de’ addur maraviglia al tuo volto».
query.result:
**English:**
124 And he to me: "You know that the place is round; 125 and although you have come a long way, 126 always to the left, descending down to the bottom,
127 you have not yet gone full circle; 128 therefore, if something new appears to you, 129 it should not cause wonder on your face."
**Malay:**
124 Dan dia kepadaku: "Kamu tahu bahwa tempat ini berbentuk bulat; 125 dan meskipun kamu telah menempuh perjalanan yang jauh, 126 selalu ke kiri, turun ke bawah,
127 kamu belum juga mengelilingi seluruh lingkaran; 128 oleh karena itu, jika sesuatu yang baru muncul padamu, 129 itu seharusnya tidak membuat heran wajahmu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 E io ancor: «Maestro, ove si trova 131 Flegetonta e Letè? ché de l’un taci, 132 e l’altro di’ che si fa d’esta piova».
query.result:
**English:**
130 And I again: "Master, where is 131 Phlegethon and Lethe? For you are silent about one, 132 and you say that the other is made of this rain."
**Malay:**
130 Dan aku sekali lagi: "Guru, di manakah 131 Flegetonta dan Letè? Karena yang satu kau diamkan, 132 dan yang lain kau katakan terbuat dari hujan ini."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 «In tutte tue question certo mi piaci», 134 rispuose, «ma ’l bollor de l’acqua rossa 135 dovea ben solver l’una che tu faci.
query.result:
**English:**
133 "In all your questions you certainly please me," 134 he replied, "but the bubbling of the red water 135 should have solved the one that you are asking.
**Malay:**
133 "Dalam semua pertanyaanmu, kamu tentu saja menyenangkan hatiku," 134 jawabnya, "tetapi gelembung air merah 135 seharusnya sudah menjawab pertanyaan yang kamu ajukan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
136 Letè vedrai, ma fuor di questa fossa, 137 là dove vanno l’anime a lavarsi 138 quando la colpa pentuta è rimossa».
query.result:
**English:**
136 You will see Lethe, but outside of this ditch, 137 there where the souls go to wash themselves 138 when the repented fault is removed.
**Malay:**
136 Engkau akan melihat Lethe, tetapi di luar parit ini, 137 di sana tempat jiwa-jiwa pergi untuk membasuh diri mereka sendiri 138 ketika kesalahan yang disesali telah dihapuskan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Poi disse: «Omai è tempo da scostarsi 140 dal bosco; fa che di retro a me vegne: 141 li margini fan via, che non son arsi,
142 e sopra loro ogne vapor si spegne».
query.result:
**English:**
139 Then he said: "Now it is time to depart 140 from the woods; see that you come behind me: 141 the edges make a path, which are not burned,
142 and every vapor is extinguished above them".
**Malay:**
139 Kemudian dia berkata: "Sekarang saatnya untuk pergi 140 dari hutan; pastikan kamu mengikutiku: 141 tepiannya membuat jalan, yang tidak terbakar,
142 dan semua uap padam di atasnya".
